description:
Solitaire+ by A-Star Software is a great new app for everyone's favorite classic card game!

Solitaire+ has a clean, beautiful look, combined with pleasant, smooth animations and sounds. It's a pleasure to play for a few minutes or a few hours. We're a game company dedicated to quality games that keep getting better over time!

Top Features:

- Draw 1 and Draw 3 modes
- Vegas games
- Beautiful custom card face and back options, for small and large screens
- Attractive game board color options
- Portrait and landscape supported
- Single-tap or drag-and-drop to play cards
- Smart AI hints
- Daily Games available every day
- Stats to track your skills and progress
- Trophies to add fun challenges to your playing
- Option to deal "Winnable" games
- Unlimited Undos
- Right and left-handed options
- Autocomplete available to quickly finish games you won
- Support for replaying a lost game to try again

Your experience is our priority and your feedback helps us keep improving. Please use the in-app Contact form (Help -> Contact) to report problems or to suggest improvements.

Enjoy the game!
- A-Star Software
